name: sherpaonnxgenatransrt
description: 2 to 3x faster Node.js scripts for generating subtitle compare to python and translating subtitles from audio/video files:

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('fs').accessSync('node_modules/sherpa-onnx-' + process.platform + '-' + process.arch) } catch (e) { console.log('Installing appropriate sherpa-onnx package for ' + process.platform + '-' + process.arch); }"
